title: Making tifs look "normal" using spectral - fork
description: This is an expansion of Robin's notebook ( https://www.kaggle.com/robinkraft/making-tifs-look-normal-using-spectral/ ) to show ways how to use the spectral module to read bands, calculate the NDVI, NDWI and save the image as a high-quality jpeg.
description_lemmatized: expansion robin notebook httpswwwkagglecomrobinkraftmakingtifslooknormalusingspectral show way use spectral module read band calculate ndvi ndwi save image highquality jpeg
